code: import*as constants from'./constants';import axios from'axios';import{fromJS}from'immutable';import{changeHomeData}from'../../../pages/home/store/actionCreators';axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;var getheaderListAction=function getheaderListAction(data){return{type:constants.GET_HEADER_LIST_ACTION,data:fromJS(data),totalPage:Math.ceil(data.length/10)};};export var searchFocus=function searchFocus(){return{type:constants.SEARCH_FOCUS};};export var searchBlur=function searchBlur(){return{type:constants.SEARCH_BLUR};};export var mouseEnter=function mouseEnter(){return{type:constants.MOUSE_ENTER};};export var mouseLeave=function mouseLeave(){return{type:constants.MOUSE_LEAVE};};export var changePage=function changePage(page){return{type:constants.CHANGE_PAGE,page:page};};export var getheaderList=function getheaderList(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/api/headerList.json').then(function(res){var data=res.data;dispatch(getheaderListAction(data.data));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var lookSelfArticle=function lookSelfArticle(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("http://35.229.221.230:3000/comment/list?filterType=2").then(function(response){var result=response.data.data;console.log(result);var action=changeHomeData(result);dispatch(action);});};};export var lookAllArticle=function lookAllArticle(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("http://35.229.221.230:3000/comment/list?filterType=1").then(function(response){var result=response.data.data;console.log(result);var action=changeHomeData(result);dispatch(action);});};};
